info.title: create_an_employee_assignment
info.x-ibm-application-name: Create an employee assignment - Internal Mobility
info.x-ibm-application-icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" width="48" height="48" fill="none"><path fill="#fff" d="M0 0h48v48H0z" style="mix-blend-mode:multiply"/><rect width="47" height="47" x=".5" y=".5" fill="#fff" rx="7.5"/><g clip-path="url(#a)"><path fill="url(#b)" d="M0 0h40v20H0z" transform="translate(4 14)"/></g><rect width="47" height="47" x=".5" y=".5" stroke="#E0E0E0" rx="7.5"/><defs><clipPath id="a"><path fill="#fff" d="M4 14h40v20H4z"/></clipPath><pattern id="b" width="1" height="1" patternContentUnits="objectBoundingBox"><use xlink:href="#c" transform="matrix(.00147 0 0 .00294 0 .353)"/></pattern><image xlink:href="data:image/png;base64," id="c" width="680" height="100"/></defs></svg>

parameters.name: empsUniqID
parameters.description: This is the hash key of the attributes which make up the composite key for the Employees resource and used to uniquely identify an instance of Employees. The client should not generate the hash key value. Instead, the client should query on the Employees collection resource in order to navigate to a specific instance of Employees to get the hash key.

requestBody.description: The following table describes the body parameters in the request for this task.

SalaryAmount.title: Salary Amount
SalaryAmount.description: Salary amount entered based on the salary frequency.

AssignmentProjectedEndDate.title: Projected End Date
AssignmentProjectedEndDate.description: Date on which the assignment is expected to end.

PrimaryWorkTermsFlag.title: Primary Employment Terms
PrimaryWorkTermsFlag.description: Indicates whether the current employment terms are primary.

EffectiveEndDate.title: Effective End Date
EffectiveEndDate.description: Date at the end of the period within which the employee assignment is effective.

ManagerType.title: Type
ManagerType.description: Role of the manager with regards to the overall organization structure. For example, functional, project leader, and so on.

BusinessUnitId.title: Business Unit ID
BusinessUnitId.description: Unique identifier for the business unit.

AssignmentCategory.title: Assignment Category
AssignmentCategory.description: User-defined category such as Full-Time Permanent or Part-Time Permanent. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentCategoryLOV.

WorkTaxAddressId.title: Tax Address ID
WorkTaxAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the address that is used for taxation purposes. This can be different from a mailing address. Valid values are defined in the list WorkTaxAddressIdLOV.

SalaryCode.title: Hourly Paid or Salaried
SalaryCode.description: Identifies whether the assignment is paid by the hour or by a salary. Either maintained at the assignment level or employment or placement terms but not both. Valid values are defined in the list SalaryCodeLOV.

TermsEffectiveStartDate.title: Effective Start Date
TermsEffectiveStartDate.description: Date at the beginning of the period within which the employee term is effective.

ProbationPeriodEndDate.title: Probation End Date
ProbationPeriodEndDate.description: End date of the probation period.

PersonTypeId.title: Person Type ID
PersonTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the person type. Valid values are defined in the list PersonTypeIdLOV.

ManagerId.title: Manager ID
ManagerId.description: Unique identifier for a manager. Valid values are defined in the list ManagerIdLOV.

PeriodOfServiceId.title: Period of Service ID
PeriodOfServiceId.description: Primary key generated by the application.

SalaryBasisId.description: Identifier for the set of details linked to a worker's base pay. It identifies the payroll characteristics used to pay base earnings, the duration for which base pay is quoted, the factor used to annualize base pay, any components used to attribute base pay adjustments to different reasons, and any associated grade rate for salary validation. Valid values are defined in the list  SalaryBasisIdLOV.

ActionCode.title: Action Code
ActionCode.description: Action performed on a particular record, such as Hire, Add Pending Worker, Manager Change, and so on. Valid values are defined in the list ActionCodeLOV.

RegularTemporary.title: Regular or Temporary
RegularTemporary.description: Indicates whether the position the employee is hired for is regular or temporary. Valid values are defined in the list RegularTemporaryLOV.

ProjectedStartDate.title: Projected Start Date
ProjectedStartDate.description: Proposed start date for the pending worker.

PrimaryAssignmentFlag.title: Primary Assignment
PrimaryAssignmentFlag.description: Indicates whether the current assignment is the primary assignment. Valid values are Yes and No.

LegalEntityId.title: Legal Entity ID
LegalEntityId.description: Unique identifier for the legal entity.

AssignmentId.title: Assignment ID
AssignmentId.description: Unique identifier for the assignment. This is a primary key generated by the application.

AssignmentNumber.title: Assignment Number
AssignmentNumber.description: Unique identifier for the assignment or terms. Valid for workers and nonworkers.

GradeId.title: Grade ID
GradeId.description: Unique identifier for the grade. Valid values are defined in the list GradeIdLOV.

JobId.title: Job ID
JobId.description: Unique identifier for the job. Valid values are defined in the list JobIdLOV.

WorkingAtHome.title: Working at Home
WorkingAtHome.description: Indicates whether the person is working at home. Valid values are Yes and No.

PrimaryWorkRelationFlag.title: Primary Work Relationship
PrimaryWorkRelationFlag.description: Indicates whether the current work relationship is primary. Valid values are Yes and No.

PositionId.title: Position ID
PositionId.description: Unique identifier for a position. Valid values are defined in the list PositionIdLOV.

LocationId.title: Location ID
LocationId.description: Unique identifier for the location. Valid values are defined in the list LocationIdLOV.

AssignmentStatusTypeId.title: Assignment Status Type ID
AssignmentStatusTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the user-defined assignment status. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentStatusTypeIdLOV.

Frequency.title: Frequency
Frequency.description: Frequency of normal working hours such as week, month, year. Valid values are defined in the list FrequencyLOV.

DepartmentId.title: Organization ID
DepartmentId.description: Unique identifier for the department. Valid values are defined in the list DepartmentIdLOV.

AssignmentStatus.title: Assignment Status
AssignmentStatus.description: HR status of the assignment, such as Active or Inactive. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentStatusLOV.

EffectiveStartDate.title: Effective Start Date
EffectiveStartDate.description: Date at the beginning of the period within which the employee assignment is effective.

WorkingAsManager.title: Working as a Manager
WorkingAsManager.description: Indicates whether the person is a manager. Valid values are Yes and No.

200.description: The following table describes the default response for this task.

GradeLadderId.title: Grade Ladder ID
GradeLadderId.description: Unique identifier for the grade ladder.

SalaryAmount.title: Salary Amount
SalaryAmount.description: Salary amount entered based on the salary frequency.

AssignmentProjectedEndDate.title: Projected End Date
AssignmentProjectedEndDate.description: Date on which the assignment is expected to end.

PrimaryWorkTermsFlag.title: Primary Employment Terms
PrimaryWorkTermsFlag.description: Indicates whether the current employment terms are primary. Valid values are Yes and No.

WorkerCategory.title: Worker Category
WorkerCategory.description: Category of the worker such as Blue Collar, Civil Servant, and so on. Valid values are defined in the list WorkerCategoryLOV.

ActionReasonCode.title: Reason Code
ActionReasonCode.description: User-defined code for the action reason. Specifies the reason for the action performed on the record. Valid values are defined in the list ActionReasonCodeLOV.

FullPartTime.title: Full Time or Part Time
FullPartTime.description: Indicates whether the position the employee is hired for is full-time or part-time. Valid values are defined in the list FullPartTimeLOV.

EffectiveEndDate.title: Effective End Date
EffectiveEndDate.description: Date at the end of the period within which the employee assignment is effective.

ManagerType.title: Type
ManagerType.description: Role of the manager with regards to the overall organization structure. For example, functional, project leader, and so on.

BusinessUnitId.title: Business Unit ID
BusinessUnitId.description: Unique identifier for the business unit. Valid values are defined in the list BusinessUnitIdLOV.

DefaultExpenseAccount.description: Default expense account represented as a concatenated value of all the related segments.

ProposedPersonTypeId.title: Proposed Person Type
ProposedPersonTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the worker class. This value is valid only if the PersonTypeId is Pending Worker. It can be any of the employee or contingent worker types. Valid values are defined in the list ProposedPersonTypeIdLOV.

PeopleGroup.description: People group represented as a concatenated value of all the related key flexfield segments.

AssignmentCategory.title: Assignment Category
AssignmentCategory.description: User-defined category such as Full-Time Permanent or Part-Time Permanent. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentCategoryLOV.

WorkTaxAddressId.title: Tax Address ID

ProbationPeriodEndDate.description: End date of the probation period.

PersonTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the person type. Valid values are defined in the list PersonTypeIdLOV.

ManagerId.title: Manager ID
ManagerId.description: Unique identifier for a manager. Valid values are defined in the list ManagerIdLOV.

ProbationPeriodUnitOfMeasure.title: Probation Unit
ProbationPeriodUnitOfMeasure.description: Units for the probation period duration. Valid values are defined in the list QUALIFYING_UNITS.

PeriodOfServiceId.title: Period of Service ID
PeriodOfServiceId.description: Primary key generated by the application.

SalaryBasisId.description: Identifier for the set of details linked to a worker's base pay. assignmentExtraInformation.description:
The assignmentExtraInformation resource is a child of the emps resource. It includes all the extensible flexfields for additional assignment information as of the specified date. By default, the current date is retained.
This resource is currently under controlled availability.

peopleGroupKeyFlexfield.description:
The peopleGroupKeyFlexfield resource is a child of the assignments resource. It includes all employee assignment key flexfields as of the specified date. By default, the current date is retained.
This resource is currently under controlled availability.

SalaryBasisIdLOV.description: A list of salary bases available for workers. A salary basis identifies the currency and period of the quoted base pay and the factor used to annualize base pay. It optionally identifies components used to itemize salary adjustments as well as the grade rate and differential profile used to validate salary.

assignmentDFF.description:
The assignmentDFF resource is a child of the assignments resource. It includes all employee assignment key flexfields as of the specified date. By default, the current date is retained.
This resource is currently under controlled availability.

empreps.description:
The empreps resource is a child of the assignments resource. It includes all employee representatives as of the specified date. By default, the current date is retained.
This resource is currently under controlled availability.

AssignmentStatusTypeIdLOV.description: The assignmentStatusTypesLov resource provides the list of values for the assignment status types.

Status.title: Status

BusinessUnitId.description: Surrogate identifier for the business unit.

WorkTaxAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the address that is used for taxation purposes. This can be different from a mailing address. Valid values are defined in the list WorkTaxAddressIdLOV.

SalaryCode.title: Hourly Paid or Salaried
SalaryCode.description: Identifies whether the assignment is paid by the hour or by a salary. Either maintained at the assignment level or employment or placement terms but not both. Valid values are defined in the list SalaryCodeLOV.

TermsEffectiveStartDate.title: Effective Start Date
TermsEffectiveStartDate.description: Date at the beginning of the period within which the employee term is effective.

ProbationPeriodEndDate.title: Probation End Date
ProbationPeriodEndDate.description: End date of the probation period.

PersonTypeId.title: Person Type ID
PersonTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the person type. Valid values are defined in the list PersonTypeIdLOV.

ManagerId.title: Manager ID
ManagerId.description: Unique identifier for a manager. Valid values are defined in the list ManagerIdLOV.

PeriodOfServiceId.title: Period of Service ID
PeriodOfServiceId.description: Primary key generated by the application.

SalaryBasisId.description: Identifier for the set of details linked to a worker's base pay. It identifies the payroll characteristics used to pay base earnings, the duration for which base pay is quoted, the factor used to annualize base pay, any components used to attribute base pay adjustments to different reasons, and any associated grade rate for salary validation. Valid values are defined in the list  SalaryBasisIdLOV.

ActionCode.title: Action Code
ActionCode.description: Action performed on a particular record, such as Hire, Add Pending Worker, Manager Change, and so on. Valid values are defined in the list ActionCodeLOV.

RegularTemporary.title: Regular or Temporary
RegularTemporary.description: Indicates whether the position the employee is hired for is regular or temporary. Valid values are defined in the list RegularTemporaryLOV.

ProjectedStartDate.title: Projected Start Date
ProjectedStartDate.description: Proposed start date for the pending worker.

PrimaryAssignmentFlag.title: Primary Assignment
PrimaryAssignmentFlag.description: Indicates whether the current assignment is the primary assignment. Valid values are Yes and No.

LegalEntityId.title: Legal Entity ID
LegalEntityId.description: Unique identifier for the legal entity.

AssignmentId.title: Assignment ID
AssignmentId.description: Unique identifier for the assignment. This is a primary key generated by the application.

AssignmentNumber.title: Assignment Number
AssignmentNumber.description: Unique identifier for the assignment or terms. Valid for workers and nonworkers.

GradeId.title: Grade ID
GradeId.description: Unique identifier for the grade. Valid values are defined in the list GradeIdLOV.

JobId.title: Job ID
JobId.description: Unique identifier for the job. Valid values are defined in the list JobIdLOV.

WorkingAtHome.title: Working at Home
WorkingAtHome.description: Indicates whether the person is working at home. Valid values are Yes and No.

PrimaryWorkRelationFlag.title: Primary Work Relationship
PrimaryWorkRelationFlag.description: Indicates whether the current work relationship is primary. Valid values are Yes and No.

PositionId.title: Position ID
PositionId.description: Unique identifier for a position. Valid values are defined in the list PositionIdLOV.

LocationId.title: Location ID
LocationId.description: Unique identifier for the location. Valid values are defined in the list LocationIdLOV.

AssignmentStatusTypeId.title: Assignment Status Type ID
AssignmentStatusTypeId.description: Unique identifier for the user-defined assignment status. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentStatusTypeIdLOV.

Frequency.title: Frequency
Frequency.description: Frequency of normal working hours such as week, month, year. Valid values are defined in the list FrequencyLOV.

DepartmentId.title: Organization ID
DepartmentId.description: Unique identifier for the department. Valid values are defined in the list DepartmentIdLOV.

AssignmentStatus.title: Assignment Status
AssignmentStatus.description: HR status of the assignment, such as Active or Inactive. Valid values are defined in the list AssignmentStatusLOV.

EffectiveStartDate.title: Effective Start Date
EffectiveStartDate.description: Date at the beginning of the period within which the employee assignment is effective.

WorkingAsManager.title: Working as a Manager
WorkingAsManager.description: Indicates whether the person is a manager. Valid values are Yes and No.
